snippet: More than 150 runners will compete on Wednesday in Austin, Tex., in the beer mile world championships, which combine sprinting with chugging beers, one before each quarter-mile.
abstract: More than 150 runners will compete in the beer mile world championships in Austin, Tex, competition that requires runners to chug four beers, one before each quarter-mile.
lead_paragraph: More than 150 runners will compete on Wednesday in Austin, Tex., in the beer mile world championships, which combine sprinting with chugging beers, one before each quarter-mile.

headline.main: Cue the ‘Chariots of Fire’ Theme, With Burps
headline.print_headline: Cue the ‘Chariots of Fire’ Theme, With Burps
